item.title: The Terrors of TRASHWORLD [Liberty Dispatch]
item.description:
Liberty Dispatch ~ November 07, 2023
WE'RE BACK!!! On our return, hosts Andrew and Matty give an overview of the latest goings-on in Trashworld.

[Segment 1] - Good Bills CANCELLED, Bad Bills ADVANCE: "NDP, Liberals Vote to Keep COVID Vaccine Mandates on the Table" | The Counter Signal: https://thecountersignal.com/ndp-liberals-vote-to-keep-covid-vaccine-mandates-on-the-table;
"Canada is Considering a Guaranteed Universal Basic Income Program: Here's What That Means" | The Star: https://www.thestar.com/news/canada/canada-is-considering-a-guaranteed-universal-basic-income-program-here-s-what-that-means/article_98a4ee99-150c-50b5-8867-0203efc51520.html;
"Canada Bans Assault-Style Guns" | Global News: https://globalnews.ca/news/10045037/assault-style-gun-ban;

[Segment 2] - Utter Incompetence from Our Magistrates:
"Liberal and NDP Debate Church Burnings" | TNC News: https://tnc.news/2023/10/26/liberal-and-ndp-debate-church-burnings;
"Montreal Gas Ban" | Global News: https://globalnews.ca/news/10048128/montreal-gas-ban;
"Trudeau Suspends Carbon Tax on Home Heating" | TNC News: https://tnc.news/2023/10/26/trudeau-suspends-carbon-tax-home-heating;

[Segment 3] - Trashworld Wrap-up:
"Trudeau Liberals Backtrack Over Policy Banning Prayer at Remembrance Day Ceremonies Following Pressure from Conservative MP" | The Post Millennial: https://thepostmillennial.com/trudeau-liberals-backtrack-over-policy-banning-prayer-at-remembrance-day-ceremonies-following-pressure-from-conservative-mp;

UPCOMING EVENTS

item.title: Robert Spencer: Islam, Jihad, and Threats to Freedom of Speech [Liberty Dispatch]
item.description:
OPEN MIKE w/Michael Thiessen ~ November 03, 2023
On this episode of Open Mike, Dr. Thiessen is joined by author Robert Spencer to discuss Islam, jihad, the current situation in Israel and Gaza and the Regime's crackdown on those who want to speak truthfully about such things.

Episode Resource: Robert's Website: https://www.jihadwatch.org/; Check out Robert's Books: https://www.jihadwatch.org/robert-spencers-books; Islam 101: https://www.jihadwatch.org/islam-101;

MUST WATCH: Muslims BLAST Jordan Peterson for Supporting Israel Against Hamas | Acts 17 Apologetics ft. David Wood, Robert Spencer, and the Apostate Prophet (AP): https://apologetics315.com/videos/acts-17-apologetics/?wchannelid=7gugggjeoo&wmediaid=udbbfnjiie;

MUST READ: What Every Christian Needs to Know About the Qur'an | James R. White: https://www.amazon.ca/Every-Christian-Needs-About-Quran/dp/0764209760/ref=sr_1_1?crid=ASYF7A804TAB&keywords=what+every+christians+needs+to+know+about+islam&qid=1697579362&s=books&sprefix=what+e+very+chrsitians+needs+to+know+about+islam%2Cstripbooks%2C84&sr=1-1
